timeline.content:
Hi, this is Arushi from Amber, the official accommodation partner for University College London . I’m here to assist you in securing your ideal student accommodation. Let me know a convenient time for a call so we can discuss your options and move forward with your booking.
Looking forward to hearing from you

timeline.content:
Hello, please let me know your preference so i can share student accommodation options near your university. 

For relevant suggestions for your accommodation search, please provide the following information-

1)Your move-in date- This will help us check the availability.
2) Your duration of stay- Some apartments allow booking only for the long term.
3) Your room preference- Ensuite, Studio, Private room and Shared bathroom, Shared room and bathroom.
4) Your budget- We want to suggest apartments only in your budget.
